project_abstract.cdata: The proposed loan would provide most of the foreign exchange costs of expanding the capacity of SNGPL's transmission system to meet the natural gas requirements of a new fertilizer plant in Lahore, and of providing additional distribution facilities in various urban areas in West Pakistan.
